div.p: The PHP Barcelona User Group is proud to announce that the PHP Barcelona Conference is back! This year we are preparing a bigger event in the heart of a glamorous city. 2 days, 30th - 31st October, one track with amazing and stunning talks.

We opened the call for papers that will end on the 30th September 2015 â€” 2015.phpconference.es/call-for-papers. So what are you waiting for, go, submit your paper! We offer attractive packages to speakers who want to enroll! Come and join us! :)
